response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily productivity and efficiency. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be significantly more than $100. To make this opportunity available to you, I am proposing to sell it to you for $150. This is a special offer tailored for potential buyers like you who appreciate exceptional value. I look forward to hearing your decision.", "product_price": 150}
